trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its strong name.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en samling tilhører en kodegruppe ved å teste det sterkt navnet.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Strong names are well suited to specifying code assemblies to which you give a rich set of powerful permissions.
trans-unit.target: Sterkt navn passer også til å angi koden samlinger som gir en lang rekke kraftige tillatelser.

trans-unit.source: Since strong names are cryptographically verified, attackers cannot impersonate rightful assemblies and use their permissions.
trans-unit.target: Siden sterkt navn er kryptografisk bekreftet, kan ikke angriper representere rettmessige samlinger og bruke tillatelsene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref> class with the strong name public key blob, name, and version number that determine membership.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"> </xref> klassen med sterkt navn offentlig nøkkel-blob, navnet og versjonsinformasjonen tallet som fastslå medlemskapet.

trans-unit.source: Strong names are well suited to specifying code assemblies to which you give a rich set of powerful permissions.
trans-unit.target: Sterkt navn passer også til å angi koden samlinger som gir en lang rekke kraftige tillatelser.

trans-unit.source: Since strong names are cryptographically verified, attackers cannot impersonate rightful assemblies and use their permissions.
trans-unit.target: Siden sterkt navn er kryptografisk bekreftet, kan ikke angriper representere rettmessige samlinger og bruke tillatelsene.

trans-unit.source: The `name` and `version` parameters are optional.
trans-unit.target: Den `name` og `version` er valgfrie.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition> that checks for <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Name%2A> (but not <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Version%2A>) by passing `null` into the `version` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel opprette en <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition>som søker etter <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Name%2A>(men ikke <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Version%2A>) ved å sende `null` til den `version` parameteren.</xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Version%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Name%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition>

trans-unit.source: If `name` is an empty string (""), an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `name` er en tom streng (""), en <xref:System.ArgumentException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The strong name public key blob of the software publisher.
trans-unit.target: Den sterkt navn offentlig nøkkel-BLOBen for utgiveren.

trans-unit.source: The simple name section of the strong name.
trans-unit.target: Delen enkelt navn på sterkt navn.

trans-unit.source: The version number of the strong name.
trans-unit.target: Versjonsnummeret for sterkt navn.

trans-unit.source: The blob parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The blob parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The name parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The name parameter is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: - eller - name er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte bevis oppfyller medlemskapsbetingelse.

trans-unit.source: This membership condition tests only the <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> evidence object.
trans-unit.target: Denne medlemskapsvilkår tester bare den <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>bevis objektet.</xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>

trans-unit.source: The membership condition is satisfied if the specified evidence contains a <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> with the same <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> (public key, name, and version) as specified by the <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition>.
trans-unit.target: Medlemskap betingelsen oppfylles hvis den angitte bevis inneholder en <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>med samme <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>(fellesnøkkel, navnet og versjonsinformasjonen) som angitt av <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition> </xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> </xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"></xref> against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"> </xref> mot vil foreta testen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte bevis oppfyller medlemskapsvilkår; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en tilsvarende kopi av gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref>
trans-unit.target: En ny, identiske kopi av gjeldende<xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"></xref> from the specified object is equivalent to the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"></xref> contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"> </xref> fra det angitte objektet er det samme som den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"> </xref> finnes i gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For two <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> classes to be equal, their name, version, and public key blob must match exactly.
trans-unit.target: For to <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>klasser som er lik, deres navn, versjonen og offentlig nøkkel-blob må samsvare med nøyaktig.</xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å sammenligne gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"></xref> from the specified object is equivalent to the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"></xref> contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"> </xref> fra det angitte objektet er det samme som den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"> </xref> finnes i gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey*> property of the current object or the specified object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey*>-egenskapen for det gjeldende objektet eller det angitte objektet er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey*>

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer et sikkerhetsobjekt med en angitt tilstand fra en XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding til å bruke Bygg opp sikkerhetsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer et sikkerhetsobjekt med en angitt tilstand fra en XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding til å bruke Bygg opp sikkerhetsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref> context, used to resolve <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"></xref> references.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"> </xref> konteksten, brukes til å løse <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"> </xref> referanser.

trans-unit.source: The e parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The e parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The e parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: Den e -parameteren er ikke et gyldig medlemskap betingelse-element.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer hashkoden for gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hash-kode for gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the simple name of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"></xref> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir enkle navnet på den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"> </xref> for Medlemskapsvilkåret tester.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set the Name property to an empty string (""), an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å angi Name-egenskapen til en tom streng (""), en <xref:System.ArgumentException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"></xref> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: Enkle navnet på den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"> </xref> for Medlemskapsvilkåret tester.

trans-unit.source: The value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: - eller - verdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"></xref> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"> </xref> for Medlemskapsvilkåret tester.

trans-unit.source: A blob is cryptographic information that uniquely specifies the public key of the software publisher.
trans-unit.target: En blob er kryptografisk informasjon som angir unikt fellesnøkkelen for utgiveren.

trans-unit.source: Blobs differ from certificates in that the blob only has information about the public key; the certificate also includes information that associates a name of the holder with the key, as well as information to verify the certificate.
trans-unit.target: BLOBer er forskjellige fra sertifikater ved at BLOBen inneholder bare informasjon om fellesnøkkelen; sertifikatet inneholder også informasjon som knytter et navn på eieren av nøkkelen, i tillegg til informasjon for å kontrollere sertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"></xref> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"> </xref> for Medlemskapsvilkåret tester.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the PublicKey to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Er gjort forsøk på å angi PublicKey <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en streng som representerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En representasjon av gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-koding sikkerhet og den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding av sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-koding sikkerhet og den gjeldende tilstanden med angitt <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref> context, which is used to resolve <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"></xref> references.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"> </xref> konteksten, som brukes til å løse <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"> </xref> referanser.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding av sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Version> of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"></xref> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Version>av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"> </xref> for Medlemskapsvilkåret tester.</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Version> of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"></xref> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Version>av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.StrongName"> </xref> for Medlemskapsvilkåret tester.</xref:System.Version>
